## Bio

Hi! I am Annesh, a statistical researcher and broadly interested in developing statistical models for high-dimensional biological data. My research focuses on unsupervised learning for medical and health applications, with extensive use of R programming language to transcend the theoretical aspects into computational implementation.

## Research Interests

- Statistical Modeling
- Bayesian Nonparametrics
- Unsupervised Learning
- Biostatistics
